location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Extract No. 266 from the Proceedings of the Governor General of India in Council in the Financial Department

mods.abstract: The extract concerns a pension awarded to Bissembhur Ghose, Head Clerk of the Cawnpore [KƒÅnpur] Executive Commissariat Office, and an enquiry from the Auditor General as to whether salaries of an acting appointment should be considered admissible when calculating someone's pension award; the Governor General's resolution to this is outlined, along with a new calculation for the Head Clerk's pension entitlement.
